Name: BlackJack Math
About the game: DISCOVER OTHER GAME FROM THIS STUDIO: / Welcome to BlackJack Math! Tease your brain in this number logic game where all answers are 21 (because we're talking about blackjack, right?) Swap the cards, make the math, repeat. That's all you'll need in order to complete this game! Key features Handcrafted Levels The game comes with 50 handcrafted levels that will tease your brain. Simple controls The game is played simply by swaping the cards in order to change the math result to be 21. Relaxing music Originally composed music to help you focus and relax while solving the puzzles (that if you do wish, can be downloaded for free in our soundtrack page!).
Meta Title: BlackJack Math: Aug 20, 2020, Heavy Sheep and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on BlackJack Math? Check out the release date (Aug 20, 2020), developer insights from Heavy Sheep, and a complete game summary.
